other_tests.findings: Identification of novel compound heterozygous missense mutations in the GHR gene: C94S and H150Q.
Baseline plasma GH concentration of 39.1 ng/ml and >50 ng/ml after stimulation.
Serum IGF-I level failed to increase after a test with human GH 0.03 mg/kg daily for 4 days.
Height velocity increased from -3.0 SDS before treatment to -1.1 SDS in the first year.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Height increased from -4.9 SDS to -3.8 SDS over 3 years of therapy.
